# Pandas

## Creating DataFrames

```{python}
import json
import pandas as pd

# from dict
data = {
    'name': ['Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie', 'David'],
    'age': [25, 30, 35, 40],
    'city': ['NYC', 'SF', 'LA', 'NYC'],
    'salary': [70000, 80000, 90000, 95000]
}

df_from_dict = pd.DataFrame(data)
print(df_from_dict)

# From list of dictionaries
records = [
    {'name': 'Alice', 'age': 25},
    {'name': 'Bob', 'age': 30}
]

df_from_list = pd.DataFrame(records)
print(df_from_list)

# from JSON
json_data = '[{"name": "Alice", "age": 25}, {"name": "Bob", "age": 30}]'
json_parsed = json.loads(json_data)
df_from_json = pd.DataFrame(json_parsed)
print(df_from_json)
```

## Basic operations

```{python}
import pandas as pd
from pandas import DataFrame
import numpy as np

np.random.seed(42)

data = {
    'name': [f'Person_{i}' for i in range(1, 51)],
    'age': np.random.randint(18, 65, 50),
    'city': np.random.choice(['New York', 'Los Angeles', 'Chicago', 'Houston', 'Phoenix', 'Philadelphia', 'San Antonio', 'San Diego', 'Dallas', 'San Jose'], 50),
    'salary': np.random.randint(30000, 120000, 50)
}

print(data)

df: DataFrame = pd.DataFrame(data)

print(df.head())
print(df.tail())
print(df.info())
print(df.describe())
print(df['age'].mean())
print(df['age'].median())
print(df['age'].std())


```
